text: Charlotte Cornwell (26 April 1949 â€“ 16 January 2021) was an English actress. She was born in London. Cornwell was a leading member of the Royal Shakespeare Company for three years. She starred Rosalind in As You Like It and Beatrice in Much Ado About Nothing. Cornwell was in many movies such as Stardust (1974), The Brute (1977), The Krays (1990), The Russia House (1990), White Hunter Black Heart (1990), The Saint (1997), Ghosts of Mars (2001) and Dead Space: Aftermath (2010). Cornwell died on 16 January 2021, aged 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * * MFA Acting Faculty Biographies at the University of Southern California Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from London
title: Charlotte Cornwell
